verses.roman:
kāhāṅ kichu kahi' govinda kare vañcana
āra dina prabhure kahe nirveda-vacana

synonyms: kāhāṅ—to someone; kichu—something; kahi'-saying; govinda—Govinda; kare vañcana—told lies; āra dina—one day; prabhure—unto Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kahe—said; nirveda-vacana—a statement of disappointment.
translation: When the devotees questioned Govinda, he had to tell them lies. Therefore one day he spoke to the Lord in disappointment.
